entries: You stalked and took down animals and other creatures of the wild. Skinning animals, harvesting their flesh, and cooking them were also part of your training, all of which can give you useful resources while you adventure.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Survival} skill and the {@skill Lore||Tanning Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Survey Wildlife} skill feat.
